Hi @Tim Abbott @all , I'm unable to retrieve API Key when SAML authentication is used.
The user is logged from Idp so does not have a password. Without password unable to retrieve rest API key because it requires user password in API call.
The following sample API call I'm using to retrieve the key.

$curlConfig = array(
    CURLOPT_URL            => "https://chat.vssc.com/api/v1/fetch_api_key",
    CURLOPT_POST           => true,
    CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
    CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS     => array(

 'username'=>'api1@gmail.com',

    )
);

Response:
I'm getting 'Misisng parameter password error'.

Is it possible to get a Rest API key when the user is authenticated using SAML(Auth)?.
